The Atlanta Hawks ( 46 - 12 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 41 ) 95 - 88 on Monday at Philips Arena in Atlanta . The Hawks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 28 - 16 right away in the first quarter . The Hawks were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 45 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 45 percent from the floor and just 35 percent from deep . The Hawks were also able to force the Magic into 17 turnovers , while only committing 18 of their own . The Hawks were led by the duo of Paul Millsap and Jeff Teague . Millsap went 8 - for - 17 from the field and 4 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 20 points , while also adding four rebounds and three assists . He 's had a very strong stretch of three games , averaging 20 points , 5 rebounds and 3 assists over his last three games . DeMarre Carroll also had a strong showing , posting 15 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt ) , eight rebounds and three steals . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 44 points and 22 rebounds over his last two games . The Magic 's next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Magic will travel to Miami to play the Heat on Saturday .

Knight went 6 - for - 14 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 17 points , while also adding five assists . He 's now averaging 16 points and 6 rebounds on the season . The Bucks ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Knicks will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Raptors were the superior shooters in this game , going 50 percent from the field and 38 percent from the three - point line , while the Raptors went 47 percent from the floor and 25 percent from beyond the arc . The Heat were led by the duo of Kyle Lowry and DeMar DeRozan . Lowry went 7 - for - 11 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 22 points , while also adding seven assists and two blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 19 points and 12 rebounds . The only other starter to reach double figures in points was Jonas Valanciunas , who posted 14 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and eight rebounds in 29 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 29 points and 12 rebounds over his last two games . Coming off the bench , James Johnson added eight points ( 4 - 6 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt ) , three rebounds and three blocked shots . The Raptors ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Raptors will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .
The Los Angeles Clippers defeated the New Orleans Pelicans , 133 - 105 , at Staples Center on Monday . The Clippers ( 7 - 7 ) checked in to Monday 's contest with only five road wins in 19 tries away from the Staples Center , but the Clippers ( 7 - 17 ) were able to pull away in the end after entering the fourth quarter with a 35 - point lead . The Clippers ( 7 - 17 ) were able to pull away in the end , however , as they outscored the Pelicans ( 17 - 17 ) by a 35 - 25 margin in the final 12 minutes . The Clippers were led by Chris Paul , who scored a game - high 20 points on 8 - of - 16 shooting , to go along with 20 assists , five rebounds and three steals , in 30 minutes . Jrue Holiday was the only other player to score in double digits for the Pelicans , as he chipped in 20 points , along with 11 assists and six rebounds , in 35 minutes off the bench . The Pelicans shot 57 percent from the field and 47 percent from long range , while the Clippers hit 57 percent of their free throws and 42 percent from the foul line . The Pelicans will look to get back on track as they go on to visit New Orleans on Monday .

The Pacers were the superior shooters in this one , going 43 percent from the field and 30 percent from the three - point line , while the Pacers went 38 percent from the floor and just 23 percent from deep . The Pacers also secured a 50 - 42 rebounding advantage . The Pacers were led by the duo of Paul George and George Hill . George went 5 - for - 17 from the field and 2 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 16 points , while also adding nine rebounds and six assists . He 's had a nice two - game stretch , combining for 39 points and 19 rebounds over his last two games . The only other starter to reach double figures in points was Solomon Hill , who finished with 15 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt ) and six rebounds . The Pacers ' next game will be on the road against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Pacers will travel to Los Angeles to play the Lakers on Tuesday .

The Thunder were the superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field and 44 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 50 percent from the floor and 33 percent from beyond the arc . The Thunder also out - rebounded the Magic 50 - 39 , giving them even more of an advantage . The Thunder were led by the duo of Kevin Durant and Russell Westbrook . Durant went 12 - for - 25 from the field and 6 - for - 12 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 37 points , while also adding seven rebounds and four assists . He 's had a nice two - game stretch , combining for 36 points and 12 assists over his last two games . The only other starter to reach double figures in points was Victor Oladipo , who posted 37 points ( 13 - 20 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) , seven rebounds and four assists . He 's had a nice two - game stretch , combining for 36 points and 12 assists over his last two games . The Thunder 's next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Magic will travel to Oklahoma City to play the Thunder on Wednesday .

They were able to pull away in the second half , outscoring the Grizzlies ( 21 - 13 ) by a 59 - 38 margin over the second and third periods . The Grizzlies ( 21 - 13 ) were led by Russell Westbrook 's 21 points , which he supplemented with five rebounds , two assists and two steals . Westbrook was right behind him with 21 points , five rebounds and two steals . Enes Kanter was right behind him with a 19 - point , five - rebound double - double that also included two assists and two blocks . Steven Adams posted a modest six points but hauled in 14 rebounds . Andre Roberson led the bench with a full stat line of six points , five rebounds , two assists and one steal . Andre Roberson and Domantas Sabonis were productive as reserves as well with matching eight - point efforts . Marc Gasol was right behind him with 25 points , eight rebounds , two assists , five blocks and one steal . Tony Allen registered eight points , nine rebounds , an assist and two steals . JaMychal Green and Jarell Martin were productive as reserves as well with matching 17 - point efforts . The Suns ( 17 - 38 ) , who had won three of their last four games , were led by James Harden , who scored a game - high 40 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting , to go along with eight assists and six rebounds in 29 minutes . Devin Booker followed up with 18 points on 6 - of - 18 shooting , to go along with two assists , one rebound and one steal , in 26 minutes . Alex Len followed up with 13 points , nine rebounds , two assists and one block , in 20 minutes off the bench .

The Thunder were the superior shooters in this game , going 53 percent from the field and 42 percent from the three - point line , while the Timberwolves went 40 percent from the floor and 42 percent from beyond the arc . The Thunder were led by the duo of Kevin Durant and Russell Westbrook . Durant went 7 - for - 14 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 21 points , while also adding seven assists and six rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 21 points and 10 assists . The Thunder 's next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Timberwolves will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .

The Suns ( 12 - 26 ) came in to Monday 's contest looking to snap a four - game losing streak , and have now lost three of their last four games . They were able to pull away in the end , however , as the Cavs ( 28 - 8 ) were able to pull away in the end . LeBron James and Kyrie Irving led the way for the Cavaliers ( 28 - 8 ) , as they combined for 62 points on 20 - of - 51 shooting from the field . James finished with 28 points , eight rebounds , four assists and one steal on 11 - of - 17 shooting , while Kyrie Irving added 27 points , seven assists and two rebounds . Kevin Love scored 25 points on 8 - of - 17 shooting , to go with 10 rebounds , one assist and one block in 36 minutes .

LaMarcus Aldridge followed up with 24 points on 10 - of - 16 shooting , to go along with nine rebounds , two steals and one block , in 32 minutes , while Manu Ginobili added eight points , five assists , two rebounds and one steal .

The Spurs got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Spurs 24 - 11 right away in the first quarter . The Spurs were able to out - score the Suns 27 - 18 in the fourth quarter , giving them the two - point victory in front of their home crowd . The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 25 - 49 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 20 - 54 ) 121 - 116 on Monday at the Target Center in Minnesota . The Suns got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Timberwolves 37 - 40 right away in the first quarter . The Suns were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 46 percent from the three - point line , while the Timberwolves went 51 percent from the floor and 27 percent from deep . The Suns also secured a 36 - 36 rebounding advantage . The Suns ' backcourt duo of Brandon Knight and Brandon Knight were the biggest contributions off the bench . Knight went 10 - for - 16 from the field and 7 - for - 11 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 30 points , while also adding five assists . He 's now averaging 16 points and 7 rebounds on the year . The Suns ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Timberwolves will travel to Los Angeles to play the Clippers on Friday .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 1 - 2 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 0 - 2 ) 112 - 94 on Wednesday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Pelicans got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pelicans 43 - 45 in the first half alone . The Pelicans were the superior shooters in this one , going 50 percent from the field and 38 percent from the three - point line , while the Pelicans went 40 percent from the floor and 33 percent from beyond the arc . The Pelicans were led by the duo of Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum . McCollum went 14 - for - 22 from the field and 6 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 37 points , while also adding six rebounds and two steals . It was his fourth double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 19 points and 13 assists . The only other Pelican to reach double figures in points was Ed Davis , who came off the bench for 12 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and 11 rebounds . The Trail Blazers ' next game will be on the road against the Sacramento Kings on Friday , while the Pelicans will travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Wednesday .

The Jazz were led by Gordon Hayward 's 25 points , which he supplemented with three rebounds , four assists and three steals . The Golden State Warriors defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 128 - 128 , at Oracle Arena on Monday . The Warriors ( 31 - 6 ) checked in to Saturday 's contest with only six road wins in 13 tries this season , and the Warriors ( 31 - 6 ) were able to pull away in the end after entering the fourth quarter with a 34 - point lead . The Warriors ( 31 - 6 ) managed to outscore Memphis 32 - 13 in the fourth quarter , outscoring the Grizzlies ( 23 - 16 ) by a 32 - 13 margin in the final 12 minutes . The Warriors were led by Marc Gasol , who scored a game - high 23 points on 9 - of - 18 shooting , to go along with five rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 41 minutes . Zach Randolph followed up with 27 points on 12 - of - 17 shooting , along with 11 rebounds , six assists and three blocks , in 35 minutes . Marc Gasol followed up with 23 points , five rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 41 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Grizzlies was JaMychal Green , who finished with four points , in 20 minutes off the bench . The Grizzlies shot 49 percent from the field and 39 percent from long range , while the Warriors shot 49 percent from the field and 27 percent from long range . The Warriors shot 49 percent from the field and 27 percent from long range , while the Warriors shot 49 percent from the field and 27 percent from deep . The Warriors will look to bounce back as they play host to the Trail Blazers on Monday . The Warriors ( 31 - 6 ) have now won three of their last four games , as they continue to fight for the top spot in the Western Conference . Stephen Curry led the way for the Grizzlies , with 40 points on 15 - of - 27 shooting , to go along with six assists , three rebounds and one steal , in 42 minutes . Klay Thompson followed up with 17 points on 7 - of - 17 shooting , to go along with six rebounds and two assists , in 42 minutes . Klay Thompson chipped in 17 points on 7 - of - 17 shooting , to go along with six rebounds and two assists , in 42 minutes .
